A smart cane that uses AI to detect obstacles and provide audio cues to help navigate through unfamiliar environments.
A portable device that can convert text into speech using advanced machine learning algorithms, allowing visually impaired individuals to read books, articles, and other written materials.
An app that uses augmented reality to overlay digital information onto real-world objects, helping visually impaired individuals identify and understand their surroundings.
A wearable device that can track facial expressions and body language, providing valuable social cues and improving communication for individuals with visual impairments.
A home automation system that can be controlled using voice commands or touch gestures, making it easier for visually impaired individuals to manage daily tasks and interact with their environment.
